ygData.subject: Re: enchanter q.
ygData.msgSnippet: Beyond level 15 or 20, it is pretty much impossible to play *any* class solo.  Some fair better than others, and I hear that at level 35+ it becomes *somewhat*
ygData.messageBody:
Beyond level 15 or 20, it is pretty much impossible to play *any* class
solo. Some fair better than others, and I hear that at level 35+ it becomes
*somewhat* feasible for us to solo again, but the fun of EQ and the point of
the game is social interaction. EQ becomes quite boring if you try to solo.
I usually mostly solo to level 10 or so then group from there on out.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath


> From: Kubleais@...
>
> I'm not in EQ yet, but I'm seriously considering it. Main
> question I have is
> whether it's really worthwhile/fun/possible to play the enchanter
> class solo?
> Stuff I've read so far kinda says that if you're not in a group,
> you're not
> goin anywhere...
